recipes.label: Trouble Brewing
recipes.startdescription: My recent fumble has emboldened my opposition.
recipes.description: My recent fumble has emboldened my opposition.

recipes.label: They're Coming For Us
recipes.startdescription: People rushing to arrest me. They may have arrested someone of my crew. It's Unlikely I ever see their face again.

slots.label: Trouble on the Town
slots.description: I know this won't end well.

recipes.label: On my Heels
recipes.startdescription: No more decoys, they are coming for me directly now.

recipes.label: The Opposition Is Organising
recipes.startdescription: <Soon they will form a proper Inquisition>
